definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: Similar opera libretto libretto, changing the length of sentence.
sentences.chinese: 唱詞類似戲曲唱詞，句式長短富於變化。

sentences.english: The double objects sentence is one kind of sentence types extremely rich in characteristics in the modern Chinese grammar system.
sentences.chinese: 雙賓語句是現代漢語語法體系中富有特色的一種句式。

sentences.english: Chapter One is an overview of the subject-object reversible sentence of which predicate is verb-complement structure.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是對述語爲動補結構的主賓可逆句式的概述。

sentences.english: The determined meaning of the structure matches the modality meaning of ta.
sentences.chinese: 句式的決心義與“他”預指時的情態義相互匹配。

sentences.english: The lausal predicate is of unique syntactic pattern in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 主謂謂語句是漢語的一種特殊句式。

sentences.english: The choice of different kinds of pattern of sentence are dependent of the cohesion of sentences and contexts.
sentences.chinese: 選擇不同的句式，常同複句關聯和篇章銜接有關。

sentences.english: The disjunctive question structure of several kinds of special sentence patterns is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 從幾種特殊句型來探討其反意疑問句的句式。

sentences.english: There are lots of synonymy sentence-type which never been formed as a system in modern Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語中同義句式的大量存在，但沒有形成系統。

sentences.english: Influenced by ancient chinese expressions and folk colloquialism, he is capable of writing short sentences in soft and lively language.
sentences.chinese: 句式以短句爲主，深受古漢語和民間口語影響。

sentences.english: Altogether five major sentence patterns and four kinds of positive semantic carriers are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 這集中反映在五種常用句式和四種褒義詞類上。

sentences.english: I know the teather that is standing beside the window.
sentences.chinese: “窗戶邊”不太確定，不過句式是對的。

sentences.english: It also demonstrates that you have a superior command of the English language.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的句式變換也證明你的英語語言掌握的比較好。

sentences.english: Linguistic metaphor is the result of and tools for human metaphoric cognition.
sentences.chinese: 語言中的隱喻句式是人類認知活動的中介工具。

definition: inversion (rhetoric device of inverting the word order for heightened effect)/anastrophe
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
